value.name: Their brother catalyzed a movement in Utah last year. Now Bernardo Palacios-Carbajal’s siblings just want relief.
value.description: Carbajal's family has described the year since his killing by Salt Lake City police as a "nightmare." That includes a traumatic raid on their home and a back-and-forth with the city over his headstone.

value.name: Bernardo Palacios-Carbajal remembered on eve of the anniversary of his death
value.description: It’s been a year since 22-year-old Bernardo Palacios-Carbajal was shot and killed by police in Salt Lake City, but his sister says she still feels like it happened yesterday. Karina Palacios ...

value.name: Utah police cleared in deadly shooting of armed man running away from officers
value.description: Two Utah police officers were cleared Thursday in the shooting death of an armed man who was fired at more than 30 times while running away. Bernardo Palacios-Carbajal, 22, died May 23 after he ...

value.name: Police union files ethics complaint against councilwoman for calling shooting ‘unlawful’
value.description: The Salt Lake Police Civilian Review Board has determined that the two officers who shot and killed Bernardo Palacios-Carbajal did not violate department policy in their use of deadly force.

value.name: Man arrested in 2 Salt Lake protests charged with breaking windows at D.A.’s office

value.name: Utah leaders support Derek Chauvin guilty verdict but add that fight for justice is ‘not over’
